com.wegas.core.websocket.pusher

Class PusherRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wegas.core.websocket.pusher.PusherRequest

  • public class PusherRequest
extends Object
    An instance of this class can be used to prepopulate properties (event or channel name) with default values
    Author:
    Stephan Scheuermann Copyright 2010. Licensed under the MIT license: http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PusherRequest(String channelName)
      Create an instance and assign a channelName that is used for each request
      PusherRequest(String channelName, String eventName)
      Create an instance and assign both channelName and eventName that are used for each request
